overview: On an October evening in Beijing, thirteen people were invited for dinner: Miki (pansexual), Chao Xiaomi (queer), Xiaotie (pansexual), Celine (heterosexual), Pig Head Cat (queer), Male brother (LES), JOAN (LES), Qin Xianqiu (GAY), Hulusi (CD), Qiuqiu (transgender), Bobby (pansexual), An Shao (LES), Jin Zhaoli (transgender). They ate, drank and told eleven love stories about themselves that were funny, weird, savage, or full of humanity.
title: Eleven Kinds of Loving
